spell_tooltip.description: Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 299,469 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 24.5 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Strike an enemy for 103,693 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 466,098 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 271,618 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 851,878 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 166,566 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Smash the target, dealing 147,088 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 77,843. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 144,962 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 237,742 health from the target over 24 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 77,843. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Heart Strike damage increased by 30%.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 15 yards of a hostile or friendly target, pulling them to the target's location.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 177,964 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 8,085 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 64,013 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.

Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 35% chance to make your next Heart Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 1% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 7.0% for 25 sec.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Blood Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 20% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Heart Strike consumes the disease to deal 130% of their remaining damage to the target.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 6% per stack.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 35% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 12% Strength for 12 sec.

Vampiric Strike and Heart Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 15% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below 35% health.

While Dancing Rune Weapon is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 200%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Heart Strike for the duration.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 304,630 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by 30% and the damage they deal to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Anti-Magic shell now removes all harmful magical effects when activated, but it's cooldown is increased by 20  sec.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 833,495 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 167,488 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Smash the target, dealing 142,786 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 77,843. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Heart Strike heals you for 0.25% health for each enemy hit while affected by Blood Plague.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Gorefiend's Grasp cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and it now also Silences enemies for 3 sec.

Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for 5 sec.

Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 271,618 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 840,850 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 167,490 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Smash the target, dealing 145,545 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 77,843. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 147,891 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 237,742 health from the target over 24 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 77,843. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Heart Strike damage increased by 30%.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 15 yards of a hostile or friendly target, pulling them to the target's location.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 177,964 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 8,085 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 64,158 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Blood Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 20% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Heart Strike consumes the disease to deal 130% of their remaining damage to the target.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 6% per stack.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 35% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 12% Strength for 12 sec.

Vampiric Strike and Heart Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 15% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below 35% health.

While Dancing Rune Weapon is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 200%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Heart Strike for the duration.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 298,559 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 24.5 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for 5 sec.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.

Chill your weapon with icy power and quickly strike the enemy, dealing 285,446 Frost damage.
A brutal attack that deals 355,291 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 48,764 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 379,759 Frost damage over 24 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases Frost Strike damage by 20%.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 100,130 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 846,774 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 50,335 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike, Soul Reaper, and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 125,672 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.

While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at 80% effectiveness.

When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.

While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at 80% effectiveness.

You may only benefit from this effect every 45 sec.
When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
Scourge Strike shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 317,794 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The damage of your diseases and Death Coil are increased by 10%.
Every 50 Runic Power you spend extends the duration of the Horsemen's aid in combat by 1 sec, up to 5 sec.
Scourge Strike deals 15% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 304,293 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by 30% and the damage they deal to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 24.5 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Strike an enemy for 101,780 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 466,098 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 833,201 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.

Strikes for 311,057 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 54,153 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 167,723 Physical damage and 92,423 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 100,914 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 71,997 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 113,378 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Death Coil deals 15% additional damage and seeks out 1 additional nearby enemy.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 508,012 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 10% from you for 10 sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can for 30 sec.
Raises an Abomination for 30 sec which wanders and attacks enemies, applying Festering Wound when it melees targets, and affecting all those nearby with Virulent Plague.

Virulent Plague has a chance to abruptly flare up, dealing 50% of the damage it dealt to target in the last 4 sec.

When this effect triggers, the duration of your active minions are increased by 1.0 sec, up to 3.0 sec.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at 75% effectiveness.
